Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Enhanced and increased search speed on desktop file searches.

English.Char_Desc_45: Fast desktop search engine for All Windows.
English.Char_Desc_80: Very fast and efficient desktop search engine for All Windows systems.
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite Desktop Search and Find is a useful windows desktop search engine that can find files, folders, and file content. This small application is also multi-threaded for instant search results. Advanced search features also included: search by content e.
English.Char_Desc_450:
SSuite Desktop Search and Find is a useful windows desktop search engine that can find files, folders, and file content. This small application is also multi-threaded for instant search results. Advanced search features included: search by content.
You can rely on this tool to search for specific files or folders on your computer by typing their name (either full or partial) and specifying the target location. The application features support
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite Desktop Search and Find is a useful windows desktop search engine that can find files, folders, and file content. This small application is also multi-threaded for instant search results. Advanced search features also included: search by content e.g. text, file size, date created, date accessed, and many more options...
Perform standard search operations or more advanced ones:
You can rely on this tool to search for specific files or folders on your computer by typing their name (either full or partial) and specifying the target location. The application features support for quick or full path searches that you can choose between, according to your needs.
Alternatively, you can choose a file type from the list, so that the application can display a list of items that match your query.
Adjust advanced search-related parameters:
Additionally, it is possible to modify various search-related parameters, such as toggling file attributes, setting file date, size and type a string of text that should match your query.
SSuite Desktop Search and Find is a lightweight, portable application that can help you locate and access various files on your computer in a quick, convenient manner. It comes with a simple user interface and straightforward functions.
This application is also completely and absolutely portable.
